mapper.insert: INSERT INTO qna(q_no, q_title, q_content, q_date, q_writer, q_pass) VALUES(qna_no_seq.NEXTVAL, #{qTitle}, #{qContent}, sysdate, #{qWriter}, #{qPass})
mapper.select: SELECT to_CHAR(q_date, 'YY/MM/DD') q_date, q_title, substr(q_writer,1,1)||'**' q_writer, q_content, q_no, qr_content, to_char(qr_date, 'YY/MM/DD') qr_date , q_pass FROM qna WHERE q_no IN(SELECT q_no FROM(SELECT rownum rnum, q_no FROM (SELECT q_no FROM qna ORDER BY q_no DESC)) WHERE rnum between ${displayPost} AND ${postNum}) ORDER BY q_no DESC
